sentences.sContent: ...a highly autobiographical novel of a woman's search for identity.
sentences.sCn: …一部关于一位女性寻找自我、自传性色彩浓厚的长篇小说。

remMethod.val: auto(自己的) + biography(传记) + ical → 自传的

words.tran: 自传的；自传体的；自传作家的

trans.tranOther: An autobiographical piece of writing relates to events in the life of the person who has written it
